r.d: The PHP client library provides fast access to documents stored in a Couchbase Server.
r.n: * Add more examples (XATTRs and RBAC user management). * PCBC-505: Enable error maps for libcouchbase 2.8.0. For higher versions it will be enabled by libcouchbase. * PCBC-499: Expose more query options on N1QL query for advanced tuning query performance * PCBC-485: Expose enhanced error message. The server might fill properties "context" and "ref" of the error.
